page.title: 14LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: Clydebank and its surrounding area is just one of the districts in Strathclyde Region. The Provost is chosen from the elected councillors. In 1985 the Provost is {David {Grainger }who is an engineer with British Rail. {A typical day in his life would be:} 1. Being interviewed by us for the Domesday Project. 2. Opening a new factory in the Clydebank Business Park. 3. Going to a meeting to discuss the renewal of licences for hotels and pubs. 4. Returning home for his lunch. 5. Going to another meeting in the Hotel Radnor. 6. Taking an overnight train to London to hand in a petition with other Provosts and Mayors from all over Great Britain to the Prime Minister.
